revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Twist Mountain |image = [[File:Twist Mountain.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Twist Mountain. |tokens = 356,500 |location = Unova Route 7 }} '''Twist Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
